tweet.text: #OTD in 1961, USIA Dir. Edward R. Murrow sent a memo to the @PeaceCorps director proposing a cooperative relationship: “The success of the Peace Corps will be closely linked to our objectives. We are eager for it to succeed.” Read the memo: https://t.co/lanuHVLZZU #PeaceCorpsWeek https://t.co/2h9aI6463L
tweet.html: #OTD in 1961, USIA Dir. Edward R. Murrow sent a memo to the @PeaceCorps director proposing a cooperative relationship: “The success of the Peace Corps will be closely linked to our objectives. We are eager for it to succeed.” Read the memo: go.usa.gov/xdvtp #PeaceCorpsWeek
